posts.post_content:
I picked up a beautiful Mathewson dark cap (PSA 5) for a client at the National a couple weeks ago and now she’s seeking an equally nice Walter Johnson Hands at Chest. 

Please PM or email if you have one to sell.  

She’s looking to stay consistent with the overall quality/eye appeal of the card, as these will be displayed together.  

Thank you!
Brad
